metadata.title: CVE-2019-16392 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
SPIP before 3.1.11 and 3.2 before 3.2.5 allows prive/formulaires/login.phpXSS via error messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-4~deb9u3build0.18.04.1').
